org.netbeans.spi.project.support.ant.AntProjectHelper

  • Packages that use AntProjectHelper 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.spi.project.support.ant
    Principal package for implementing typical Ant-based projects.

    • Uses of AntProjectHelper in org.netbeans.spi.project.support.ant

      See ProjectGenerator.createProject(FileObject, String) for more details.
      AntProjectHelper AntProjectEvent.getHelper()

      Constructor and Description

      Deprecated. 
      Rather use SourcesHelper.SourcesHelper(Project, AntProjectHelper, PropertyEvaluator).
      SourcesHelper(Project project, AntProjectHelper aph, PropertyEvaluator evaluator)
      Create the helper object, initially configured to recognize only sources contained inside the project directory.
